extends BaseScanUISettings

    • Method Detail

      • getShowDialogAfterScan

        public boolean getShowDialogAfterScan(boolean defaultValue)
        Returns flag which indicates whether result dialog should be shown after each barcode scan. Note that regardless of this setting, when using RecognizerRunnerFragment with BarcodeOverlayController, the dialog will not be raised by the fragment - this setting only affects BarcodeScanActivity.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - Value to return if value has not been explicitly set.
        Returns:
        flag which indicates whether result dialog should be shown after each barcode scan.

      • setShowDialogAfterScan

        public void setShowDialogAfterScan(@Nullable
                                   java.lang.Boolean showDialogAfterScan)
        Defines whether result dialog should be shown after each barcode scan, default is true. Note that regardless of this setting, when using RecognizerRunnerFragment with BarcodeOverlayController, the dialog will not be raised by the fragment - this setting only affects BarcodeScanActivity.
        Parameters:
        showDialogAfterScan - whether result dialog should be shown after each barcode scan.

      • getTargetActivity

        public java.lang.Class getTargetActivity()
        Description copied from class: UISettings
        Returns target activity. Concrete settings can be used only with the corresponding activity. This method is public for convenience when you are not able to use ActivityRunner. DO NOT USE THIS METHOD UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING. Improper usage will crash your app.
        Specified by:
        getTargetActivity in class UISettings
        Returns:
        target activity.
